name: X-Mas Sin

ingredients.name: Château de Laubade XO Bas Armagnac

preparation:
OK, sure, the name of this cocktail has a naughty Christmas sort of vibe. But that doesn't mean you can't sip this steamy drink all throughout the colder months, enjoying the pick-me-up hint of coffee paired with the rich bite of Armagnac.

In a small saucepan, combine all of the ingredients except for the water, and heat without bringing to a boil.

Strain the mixture into a toddy glass, and top with hot water to fill.
